title: is anyone getting massive lag that wont stop?
body:
I started the game with like 50-60ms then i suddenly jumped above 500 then settled at 350ish for the remainder of the game. Is it just me?
This has never happened before and ive checked my pc and i have League and Skype open. Im so confused, help please

replies.body: Repair work is currently underway on the PIPE Pacific Cable-1 (PPC-1) system stretching from Sydney (Australia) to Guam, according to the cable’s owner, Australia-based TPG Telecom. As previously reported by TeleGeography’s Cable Compendium in early February, the submarine cable broke around 4,590km from the cable’s landing station in Piti (Guam), roughly 2km below the surface. In the meantime, TPG Telecom said that traffic has been routed via alternate routes, including the Australia-Japan Cable (AJC) and Southern Cross Cable Network (SCCN).

> [{quoted}](name=MegaGnarles,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=GYiftAVf,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-03-22T10:53:01.302+0000)
>
> Repair work is currently underway on the PIPE Pacific Cable-1 (PPC-1) system stretching from Sydney (Australia) to Guam, according to the cable’s owner, Australia-based TPG Telecom. As previously reported by TeleGeography’s Cable Compendium in early February, the submarine cable broke around 4,590km from the cable’s landing station in Piti (Guam), roughly 2km below the surface. In the meantime, TPG Telecom said that traffic has been routed via alternate routes, including the Australia-Japan Cable (AJC) and Southern Cross Cable Network (SCCN).

Hi MegaGnarles, can you give us an update on the network? The lag is getting worse since last week, from 230-280 ping to over 300 ping now! Thanks.

Yes, I just logged into a game and I got 300 to 400 ping for some reason but here's the thing.
I actually mixed up the information and the cable that I said was cut PPC-1 was already fixed by 7th of March so it's not their problem. That's why between 7th of March to 18 th of March you should see a decrease in ping. However from the 18th and onward the fiber cable that Mindstar said was cut and for some reason, there is absolutely no news or updates on a cable cut between hk and aus on the website. I have scoured the internet and found no cable cuts on the 18th and no updates or anything.
Heres the website I use to check for any news on cable cuts: https://www.telegeography.com/products/commsupdate/articles/search/?words=%2Btag%3ASubmarine

> [{quoted}](name=MegaGnarles,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=GYiftAVf,comment-id=0001000100000000,timestamp=2016-04-15T17:16:19.323+0000)
>
> Yes, I just logged into a game and I got 300 to 400 ping for some reason but here's the thing.
> I actually mixed up the information and the cable that I said was cut PPC-1 was already fixed by 7th of March so it's not their problem. That's why between 7th of March to 18 th of March you should see a decrease in ping. However from the 18th and onward the fiber cable that Mindstar said was cut and for some reason, there is absolutely no news or updates on a cable cut between hk and aus on the website. I have scoured the internet and found no cable cuts on the 18th and no updates or anything.
> Heres the website I use to check for any news on cable cuts: https://www.telegeography.com/products/commsupdate/articles/search/?words=%2Btag%3ASubmarine

Hi MegaGnarles,

Thanks for the update. Can you keep us updated since we are not familiar with the search of those cable news and I play league every day...

> [{quoted}](name=Senpai Im ready,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=GYiftAVf,comment-id=00010001000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-16T12:45:16.739+0000)
>
> Hi MegaGnarles,
> 
> Thanks for the update. Can you keep us updated since we are not familiar with the search of those cable news and I play league every day..
Hey senpai I was just wondering if you recieved a decrease in ping on the 20th? Back down to around 120 to 150 ping.

> [{quoted}](name=MegaGnarles,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=GYiftAVf,comment-id=000100010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-21T15:32:05.351+0000)
>
> Hey senpai I was just wondering if you recieved a decrease in ping on the 20th? Back down to around 120 to 150 ping.

Yes I do. Just on that night the ping was 170 and 140 in the 2 games i played. Than on the next day it went back to 250-300.

Hi guys,

From the traceroute here it looks like you might be affected by the cable cut on one of the fibre links between Australia and Hong Kong.  While that is down, ISPs will be sending traffic via less optimal routes (via singapore / via the USA), which will increase latency.

I'd expect it to take a few weeks before it is fixed (they usually have to send a ship out to find / fix the broken cable).

Cheers
Mindstar

Hey there,

Could you please download [WinMTR](http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/winmtr/WinMTR-v092.zip) and run a traceroute to the following IP address (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes), export the results as text and reply back with them (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this.)

>103.240.227.5

Could I also get you to run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) and post back with a link to your results page.
